title: The Switch is now Nintendo’s best-selling console of all time
summary: The original Switch is officially Nintendo's best-selling console of all time after surpassing the DS handheld in lifetime sales. In its latest earnings release, Nintendo reports that the Nintendo Switch has, as of December 31, 2025, sold 155.37 million units since its launch in 2017, compared to 154.02 million units for the 2004 Nintendo DS. […]

title: Adobe Animate is shutting down next month
summary: Adobe is pulling the plug on Adobe Animate. In a FAQ posted to Adobe's website, the company says it will stop selling the animation software on March 1st, citing the emergence of new platforms "that better serve the needs of the users." Users have until March 1st, 2027 (or March 1st, 2029 for enterprise customers) […]

title: Crunchyroll is raising prices again
summary: Crunchyroll is raising its prices in the US and "select international markets," including the first price hike to its lowest-priced tier since 2019.
